channel.title: Comments on: Nannies are Essential Workers
channel.description: Better nannying for North Carolina starts here!

item.title: By: (triad) Free Hand Sanitizer – North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies
item.dc:creator: (triad) Free Hand Sanitizer – North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies
item.description: […] nannies, especially those of you in Greensboro, go get your essential working selves some personal protective hand sanitizer … […]
item.content:encoded: […] nannies, especially those of you in Greensboro, go get your essential working selves some personal protective hand sanitizer … […]

item.title: By: Jennifer Levenbook
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://theinfamousj.github.io/ncpan/uncategorized/50428#comment-2344">Megan Moulton</a>.
I appreciate you asking for clarification! Essential does not mean that nannies are required to report for duty, and some surely will choose not to do so. Essential only means that nannies cannot be charged with violating a stay-home order should they choose to go to work. Hopefully https://theinfamousj.github.io/ncpan/uncategorized/50428#essential explains it better than I can.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Megan Moulton.

I appreciate you asking for clarification! Essential does not mean that nannies are required to report for duty, and some surely will choose not to do so. Essential only means that nannies cannot be charged with violating a stay-home order should they choose to go to work. Hopefully https://theinfamousj.github.io/ncpan/uncategorized/50428#essential explains it better than I can.

item.title: By: Megan Moulton
item.dc:creator: Megan Moulton
item.description: Why is it that Charlotte area nannies, from what I understand from this post, won't be going to work if they're deemed essential? You state we are essential with great facts to back it up, but at the end say that nannies in Charlotte will be missing their charges. I'm so confused.
item.content:encoded: Why is it that Charlotte area nannies, from what I understand from this post, won’t be going to work if they’re deemed essential? You state we are essential with great facts to back it up, but at the end say that nannies in Charlotte will be missing their charges. I’m so confused.
